rows.label: bf08490100_0010
rows.name:
Boss!
Shin and his group's ship has stopped!

rows.label: bf08490100_0020
rows.name: Looks to me like they're gonna try and get inside!

rows.label: bf08490100_0030
rows.name:
Marveni,
We will stop Shin.

rows.label: bf08490100_0040
rows.name: That's why you need to stop this!

rows.label: bf08490100_0050
rows.name: You're not making any sense.

rows.label: bf08490100_0055
rows.name:
We have the chance to eliminate them 
completely right now.

rows.label: bf08490100_0060
rows.name: I am merely doing what you should be doing.

rows.label: bf08490100_0070
rows.name: My duty isn't to destroy Shin and the others.

rows.label: bf08490100_0080
rows.name: It's to stop them.

rows.label: bf08490100_0090
rows.name:
You really think they're going 
to negotiate with you?

rows.label: bf08490100_0100
rows.name: Yeah, I think so.

rows.label: bf08490100_0110
rows.name:
Shin told me everything
about what happened 500 years ago.

rows.label: bf08490100_0120
rows.name:
Weren't you the one who pushed 
Shin to become what he is?

rows.label: bf08490100_0130
rows.name: I only relayed the words of God.

rows.label: bf08490100_0140
rows.name: Then I'll go meet this God myself \band get the truth.

rows.label: bf08490100_0142
rows.name: About us, about Homura and Hikari.

rows.label: bf08490100_0150
rows.name:
That is my duty,
not yours.

rows.label: bf08490100_0160
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Ah!

rows.label: bf08490100_0170
rows.name: So you resist?

rows.label: bf08490100_0175
rows.name: Once again you reject me?

rows.label: bf08490100_0180
rows.name: I won't do as you wish.

rows.label: bf08490100_0190
rows.name: I-I am Rex's Blade!

rows.label: bf08490100_0200
rows.name:
I-indeed!
Rex, you're also a Driver of the Heaven's Holy Grail.

rows.label: bf08490100_0210
rows.name: If he can do it, there's no reason you can't.

rows.label: bf08490100_0220
rows.name: I can do it too...

rows.label: bf08490100_0230
rows.name: That's right, Rex.

rows.label: bf08490100_0232
rows.name:
Power depends on the heart of 
the one who wields it... right?

rows.label: bf08490100_0240
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Hyaaaarrrgh!
